Description.Text: InterContinental London Westminster is a luxury 5-star hotel offering elegant accommodation in the heart of London. Highlights include a 24-hour gym, free Wi-Fi, stunning interiors, a smokehouse restaurant and an excellent location close to Buckingham Palace, Big Ben and St. James's Park. Westminster is a historic area with a large concentration of London's prestigious landmarks and visitor attractions. Nearby places of interest include Buckingham Palace, Big Ben, Trafalgar Square and Westminster Abbey. St James's Park tube station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular London destinations. The hotel is housed in Queen Anne's Chambers, a former government property comprising four adjoining 19th-century mid-rise buildings. The inner buildings feature mansard roofs and red-brick facades, whilst the outer buildings feature Dutch gables and flat, light coloured facades. Facilities include a 24-hour gym, and free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Blue Boar Smokehouse offers British-influenced American grill and barbeque dishes prepared in charcoal and smoking ovens. The adjoining bar serves a wide range of light snacks, sharing platters, wines, cocktails and spirits in a modern setting. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are also plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Superior rooms are 28sqm and decorated in a contemporary elegant style. Amenities include air-conditioning, free bottled water, a work desk, safe, iPod dock and 42-inch HDTV with on-demand content and laptop connectivity. Guests are also entitled to complimentary soft drinks from the mini-bar. The marble bathrooms feature a bathtub, separate walk-in shower and complimentary toiletries. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.
